changeSet.author: mcovarr
changeSet.comment: Delete rows from the summary queue that correspond to metadata that will not be summarized.
changeSet.sql: DELETE SUMMARY_QUEUE_ENTRY FROM SUMMARY_QUEUE_ENTRY INNER JOIN METADATA_ENTRY ON SUMMARY_QUEUE_ENTRY.METADATA_JOURNAL_ID = METADATA_ENTRY.METADATA_JOURNAL_ID WHERE NOT( METADATA_ENTRY.CALL_FQN IS NULL AND METADATA_ENTRY.JOB_SCATTER_INDEX IS NULL AND METADATA_ENTRY.JOB_RETRY_ATTEMPT IS NULL AND ( METADATA_ENTRY.METADATA_KEY in ('start', 'end', 'workflowName', 'status', 'submission', 'parentWorkflowId', 'rootWorkflowId') OR METADATA_ENTRY.METADATA_KEY LIKE 'labels%' ) )
